channel.title: semantic completion on Yida Wang
channel.description: Recent content in semantic completion on Yida Wang

item.title: Self-supervised Latent Space Optimization with Nebula Variational Coding
item.description: Re-direct to the full PAPER and CODE Abstrarct Deep learning approaches process data in a layer-by-layer way with intermediate (or latent) features. We aim at designing a general solution to optimize the latent manifolds to improve the performance on classification, segmentation, completion and/or reconstruction through probabilistic models. This paper proposes a variational inference model which leads to a clustered embedding. We introduce additional variables in the latent space, called nebula anchors, that guide the latent variables to form clusters during training.

item.title: Learning Local Displacements for Point Cloud Completion
item.description: Re-direct to the full PAPER and CODE Abstrarct Completing a car From the input partial scan to our object completion, we visualize the amount of detail in our reconstruction. We propose a novel approach aimed at object and semantic scene completion from a partial scan represented as a 3D point cloud. Our architecture relies on three novel layers that are used successively within an encoder-decoder structure and specifically developed for the task at hand.

item.title: ForkNet, Multi-Branch Volumetric Semantic Completion From a Single Depth Image
item.description: Re-direct to the full PAPER and CODE Abstrarct Scene completion Object completion We propose a novel model for 3D semantic completion from a single depth image, based on a single encoder and three separate generators used to reconstruct different geometric and semantic representations of the original and completed scene, all sharing the same latent space.
